title: Hey Riot, can you help me out by giving me 1 RP?
body: I need 1 RP to get a box/key set.  I drew this unmasked Kayle picture!  Thank you and I hope you like it!

replies.body:
{{sticker:sg-lux}} 

HOOOOOOOOOOLY THIS IS AMAZING!!!!! Refresh your client to see that RP added, but feel free to use this art for another in the future. Def worth more than 1 RP!
